item.title: 星展集团首席执行官称特朗普将对削减交易持开放态度，这可能适合中国
item.description: 新加坡星展银行集团首席执行官皮尤什-古普塔（Piyush Gupta）周二表示，美国总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）如果获胜，将对削减交易持开放态度，这可能适合中国。【原文：Singapore bank DBS Group's CEO Piyush Gupta said on Tuesday American presidential candidate Donald Trump, if he wins, would be open to cutting deals, which could suit China.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随华尔街走高，市场期待鲍威尔的鸽派立场
item.description: 亚洲股市周二追随华尔街走高，因为市场希望美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）在当天晚些时候对宽松前景持鸽派态度，而美元则在四周低点附近企稳。【原文：Asian shares tracked Wall Street higher on Tuesday as markets hoped the U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell would sound dovish about easing prospects later in the day, while the dollar steadied near four-week lows.】

item.title: 中金公司高管认为中国客户在越南面临战略机遇
item.description: 中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp）东南亚地区负责人兼新加坡首席执行官黄志龙（Stephen Ng）表示，该行看到了中国企业客户在越南的更多战略机遇。【原文：China International Capital Corp's head of Southeast Asia and Singapore CEO Stephen Ng has said the bank is seeing more strategic opportunities for Chinese corporate clients in Vietnam.】

item.title: 澳大利亚承诺为太平洋银行业提供更多资金，以应对中国的兴趣
item.description: 在全球金融公司以风险为由限制对太平洋岛国的服务之后，澳大利亚周二承诺增加对太平洋岛国的投资，以支持这些国家的银行系统。【原文：Australia on Tuesday pledged to boost investments in Pacific Island countries to support their banking systems after global financial firms limit services with them, citing risks, at a time when China is looking to increase its influence in the region.】

item.title: 鲍威尔证词前美元下跌；欧元抵御法国的不确定性
item.description: 周二，美元兑主要货币汇率维持在数周低点附近，仍在因周五意外疲软的就业报告而耿耿于怀，交易员们在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的证词，以寻找加息路径的线索。【原文：The U.S. dollar hung near a multi-week low versus major peers on Tuesday, still smarting from Friday's unexpectedly soft jobs report as traders awaited testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell for clues on the path of interest rates.】

item.title: 调查显示：澳大利亚 6 月商业状况恶化，就业前景黯淡
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，澳大利亚6月份的商业状况恶化，就业前景受到明显打击，不过由于成本压力有所缓解，企业的信心略有增强。【原文：Australian business conditions worsened in June with the outlook for employment taking a notable hit, a survey showed on Tuesday, though firms were a little more confident as cost pressures eased.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将再用几周时间完成债务重组谈判
item.description: 斯里兰卡外交部长阿里-萨布里（Ali Sabry）周二表示，斯里兰卡将在几周内结束与国际债券持有人就其重组进程进行的会谈，这是该岛国摆脱数十年来最严重金融危机的重要一步。【原文：Sri Lanka will wrap up talks with international bondholders on its restructuring process in a few weeks, Foreign Minister Ali Sabry said on Tuesday, a major step for the island nation to emerge from its worst financial crisis in decades.】

item.title: 油价变化不大，对飓风破坏的担忧有所缓解
item.description: 飓风袭击了美国得克萨斯州的一个重要石油生产中心，造成的破坏比预期的要小，因此周二早盘油价变化不大。【原文：Oil prices were little changed early on Tuesday after a hurricane that hit a key U.S. oil producing hub in Texas caused less damage than expected.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者对税率持悲观态度，税收减免尚未显现
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于对借贷成本可能上升的担忧盖过了降低税收和政府减免电费的前景，7月份澳大利亚消费者情绪有所下降。【原文：Australian consumer sentiment fell in July as fears about a possible rise in borrowing costs overshadowed the prospect of lower taxes and government relief on power bills, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 DigitalX 将在 ASX 推出现货比特币 ETF
item.description: 澳大利亚 DigitalX 公司周二表示，该公司已获准在澳大利亚证券交易所上市其现货比特币交易所交易基金。【原文：Australia's DigitalX said on Tuesday that it has obtained approval to list its spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund on the Australian Securities Exchange.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Bapcor 拒绝贝恩资本 12 亿美元的收购；任命新首席执行官
item.description: 汽车零部件零售商 Bapcor 周二拒绝了私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）18.3 亿澳元（12.3 亿美元）的收购提议，称该提议 "不代表 Bapcor 的公平价值"。【原文：Auto parts retailer Bapcor rejected on Tuesday the A$1.83 billion ($1.23 billion) buyout offer from private equity firm Bain Capital, saying the proposal "does not represent fair value for Bapcor".】

item.title: 普渡大学债权人寻求批准起诉赛克勒家族成员
item.description: 普渡制药公司的债权人周一向美国一家破产法院寻求许可，以起诉该公司富有的所有者，他们认为在这家奥施康定生产商重新启动破产和解谈判时，诉讼既可以作为谈判工具，也可以作为后备选择。【原文：Purdue Pharma's creditors sought permission from a U.S. bankruptcy court on Monday to sue the company's wealthy owners, arguing that the litigation can serve as both a negotiating tool and a fallback option as the OxyContin maker re-starts talks on a bankruptcy settlement.】

item.title: 亚洲 放眼鲍威尔
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称美国大选前标准普尔 500 指数 "极有可能 "下跌 10
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）首席投资官迈克-威尔逊（Mike Wilson）周一在接受彭博电视采访时表示，在 11 月美国总统大选之前，基准 S&P 500 股票指数下跌 10%是 "极有可能的"。【原文：A decline of 10% in the benchmark S&P 500 stock index before the U.S. presidential election in November is "highly likely," Morgan Stanley Chief Investment Officer Mike Wilson said in an interview on Monday with Bloomberg TV.】

item.title: CBOE 申请美国证券交易委员会批准 Solana ETF 上市，所需决策开始计时
item.description: 交易所运营商 CBOE Global Markets 周一向美国证券交易委员会提出申请，希望上市与加密货币索拉纳（Solana）相关的交易所交易基金（ETF），要求该机构在 3 月前做出决定。【原文：Exchange operator CBOE Global Markets filed a request with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday seeking to list exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tied to cryptocurrency Solana, requiring the agency to make a decision by March.】

item.title: Skydance 的大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）描述派拉蒙的科技与媒体混合未来
item.description: Skydance Media 首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）周一勾画了派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）作为一家科技与媒体混合公司的愿景，而此时好莱坞正与进军娱乐业的科技巨头争夺注意力。【原文：Skydance Media CEO David Ellison on Monday sketched out a vision for Paramount Global as a technology-media hybrid company at a time Hollywood has been competing for attention with tech giants moving into the entertainment business.】

item.title: 微软将向中国员工提供苹果设备，理由是缺乏安卓服务
item.description: 微软公司发言人周一表示，微软打算向中国员工提供基于苹果 iOS 系统的设备，以便他们访问身份验证应用程序，理由是谷歌的安卓服务在中国缺失。【原文：Microsoft intends to offer Apple's iOS-based devices to its employees in China to access authentication apps, a company spokesperson said on Monday, citing absence of Google's Android services in the country.】

item.title: 五角大楼将评估波音与司法部达成的协议，然后再决定认罪的影响
item.description: 一位美国国防部官员周一告诉路透社记者，五角大楼计划先评估波音公司的改进计划和司法部的交易，然后再确定这家飞机制造商的认罪计划会对其政府合同产生什么影响。【原文：The Pentagon plans to assess Boeing's improvement plans and Justice Department deal before determining what impact the planemaker's plan to plead guilty could have on its government contracts, a U.S. defense official told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 巴西鸡肉出口商受惠于美国竞争减少和中东地区需求强劲
item.description: 巴西肉类协会（ABPA）周一称，巴西鸡肉出口数据显示，2024年剩余时间内巴西鸡肉出口前景乐观，理由是来自美国供应的竞争减弱以及传统中东进口商的需求持续强劲。【原文：Brazilian chicken export data indicates the outlook is positive for the remainder of 2024, meat lobby ABPA said on Monday, citing weaker competition from U.S. supplies and continued strong demand from traditional Middle East importers.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构将重新提出开放式基金 "摆动定价 "规则
item.description: 根据周一的一份监管议程，华尔街的最高监管机构不再希望推进关于所谓开放式基金流动性管理的 "摆动定价 "法规提案，而是在面临业界反对后选择发布一份新提案。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator no longer expects to move ahead with proposed "swing pricing" regulations on the management of liquidity at so-called open-end funds, choosing instead to issue a fresh proposal after facing industry opposition, according to a regulatory agenda on Monday.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司航班起飞后失去方向盘
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周一表示，该公司一架波音飞机在从洛杉矶起飞时，主起落架机轮丢失。【原文：A United Airlines jet lost a main landing gear wheel while taking off from Los Angeles, it said on Monday, months after a similar incident at the carrier involving a Boeing jet.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称贝恩资本接近达成收购 Envestnet 的交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周一表示，私募股权公司贝恩资本（Bain Capital）即将达成收购美国金融软件供应商 Envestnet 的交易，市值约为 35 亿美元。【原文：Private equity firm Bain Capital is nearing a deal to acquire Envestnet , a U.S. financial software vendor with a market value of about $3.5 billion, people familiar with the matter said on Monday.】

item.title: 花旗银行将停止在海地的业务
item.description: 花旗集团周一表示，由于国际活动减少和海地机构客户需求下降，该公司将停止在海地的业务。【原文：Citigroup said on Monday it was ceasing its operations in Haiti due to diminished international activity and lower institutional client demand in the country.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司 11 个月来首次上调汽油价格
item.description: 巴西国营石油公司（Petrobras）周一表示，本周将在近一年来首次提高经销商的汽油价格，同时还将提高液化石油气（LPG）的价格。【原文：Brazilian state-run oil company Petrobras will raise gasoline prices for distributors for the first time in almost a year this week, it said on Monday, while also hiking liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) prices.】

item.title: 三藩市联储文件：美国 "盈亏平衡 "月度就业增长可能为 23 万
item.description: 据旧金山联邦储备银行周一发表的研究报告称，近年来美国劳动力的激增可能已将避免失业率上升所需的新增就业岗位数量推高至每月约23万个。【原文：A surge in the U.S. labor force in recent years may have driven up the number of new jobs needed to avoid a rise in the unemployment rate to around 230,000 a month, according to research published Monday by the San Francisco Federal Reserve Bank.】

item.title: 埃克森公司第二季度业绩低于市场共识，不包括收购先锋公司
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）周一表示，整个行业炼油利润率的下降和天然气价格的下跌将减少第二季度的利润。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp on Monday signaled that lower refining margins across the industry and lower natural gas prices will reduce profits in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局因氧气面罩问题下令检查 2,600 架波音 737 飞机
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周一表示，由于乘客氧气面罩在紧急情况下可能失灵，因此要求对 2600 架波音 737 飞机进行检查。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said Monday it is requiring inspections of 2,600 Boeing 737 airplanes because passenger oxygen masks could fail during an emergency.】

item.title: 空中客车公司确认上半年交付 323 架飞机
item.description: 空中客车公司周一证实，今年上半年已交付 323 架飞机，比 2023 年同期的 316 架增长了 2%。【原文：Airbus confirmed on Monday it had delivered 323 airplanes in the first half of the year, up 2% from 316 in the same period of 2023.】

item.title: 麦德龙银行称正在就潜在抵押贷款组合出售事宜进行谈判
item.description: 英国贷款机构麦德龙银行周一表示，正在就可能处置价值数十亿英镑的住宅抵押贷款进行谈判。【原文：British lender Metro Bank said on Monday it was in talks about a potential disposal of residential mortgage loans worth billions of pounds.】

item.title: 波音公司正与美国国防部就认罪的影响进行谈判 - 消息人士
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，波音公司正在与美国国防部就该飞机制造商的认罪计划如何影响其大量政府合同进行谈判。【原文：Boeing is in talks with the U.S. Defense Department over how the planemaker's planned guilty plea could affect its extensive government contracts, a person briefed on the matter said.】
